about_the_game:
Rekesh Gaal - is a Hardcore Hack & Slash Action RPG.
You are a wanderer chosen to fight evil. Choose your path, explore gloomy locations and find secret places. Defeat your enemies through complex character development, hundreds of unique items and crafting.

Key Features

Explore the Unknown.
Traverse varied towns, ancient ruins and dungeons as you unravel the mysteries of the world of Rekesh Gaal. Assume the role of a lone hero, venturing into the heart of malevolence that has gripped the world.



Infinite Combination of Skills.
Create your own unique character class using over 210 different skills across 30 skill branches.



Special Skills-Forms.
Hunt for exceptionally rare components - the Elemental Particles to unlock special Form Skills.



Items.
Collect Hundreds of Items: Common, rare, legendary and epic classes of loot. Upgrade your favorite weapons or armor of any rarity to unprecedented power. In Rekesh Gaal, you don't have to constantly change your favorite weapon or armor to new or rarer ones.

Recipe Based Crafting
Collect over 500 crafting recipes that allow you to create unique crafted items or artefacts and then, later, use those basic crafted items with higher-tiered recipes to complete items of fantastic power. Use recipes to upgrade your favorite weapons or armor of any rarity.

  • Processor: Intel i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB NVIDIA GeForce 6800 series or ATI Radeon X800 series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
